tasks.label: MEGA: Live Health Check (Ports+HTTP)
args: $ErrorActionPreference='Continue'; Write-Host "== PORT CHECK (LISTENING) =="; $ports = 11434,3000,8000,8502,8503; foreach($p in $ports){ $hits = netstat -ano | Select-String (":"+$p+"\s+"); if($hits){ Write-Host ("Port {0}: LISTENING" -f $p); $hits | Select-Object -First 2 | ForEach-Object { $_.Line } } else { Write-Host ("Port {0}: NOT LISTENING" -f $p) } }; Write-Host "\n== HTTP CHECKS =="; function Test-Url($url){ try { $r = Invoke-WebRequest -Uri $url -UseBasicParsing -TimeoutSec 3; Write-Host ("OK {0} -> {1}" -f $url, $r.StatusCode); if($r.Content){ $c=$r.Content; if($c.Length -gt 160){$c=$c.Substring(0,160)+'...'}; Write-Host ('  Body: '+$c) } } catch { Write-Host ("FAIL {0} -> {1}" -f $url, $_.Exception.Message) } }; Test-Url "http://127.0.0.1:11434/api/tags"; Test-Url "http://127.0.0.1:8000/health"; Test-Url "http://127.0.0.1:8503/health"; Test-Url "http://127.0.0.1:3000/status"; Test-Url "http://127.0.0.1:3000/health"; Write-Host "\n== TOOLING =="; try { Write-Host ('node: ' + (node --version)) } catch { Write-Host 'node: NOT FOUND' }; try { Write-Host ('dotnet: ' + (dotnet --version)) } catch { Write-Host 'dotnet: NOT FOUND' }; try { Write-Host ('python: ' + (C:/cashmoneycolors/-MEGA-ULTRA-ROBOTER-KI/.venv/Scripts/python.exe --version)) } catch { Write-Host 'python venv: NOT FOUND' }
